article_metadata.description: BARRINGTON — In a brief town hall visit, potential republican presidential candidate Donald Trump told a crowd that leadership was desperately needed to make the country great again.“Our country is in trouble,” he said.The U.S. economy continues to fall behind, and leadership was his answer to what he sees as the country's troubles.“We don’t win at anything,” he said. “We need to change things and change things fast.”Other countries like
article_metadata.author: Brian Early bearly@fosters.com
